mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(user_Id, company_Name, company_Email, company_Phone, history, address, introduction, created_At) VALUE(#{userId}, #{companyName}, #{companyEmail}, #{companyPhone}, #{history}, #{address}, #{introduction}, now())
mapper.update: Update company SET company_name = #{companyName}, company_email = #{companyEmail}, company_phone = #{companyPhone}, tech = #{tech}, address = #{address}, ceoName = #{ceoName} WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(subject_id) AS recommend_count , FIRST.* FROM recommend LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT company.user_id, company.company_id, company.company_name,company.address, notice.salary FROM company LEFT OUTER JOIN notice ON company.company_id = notice.company_id) FIRST ON recommend.subject_id = FIRST.user_id GROUP BY (subject_id) ORDER BY subject_id
